cheatsheet.title: Import and compile a report from the samples

intro.description: In this tutorial we will see how to open an example report from the Samples. If the samples was not in your workspace you can also import them following this cheatsheet

item.title: Import the samples
item.description: You need to import the report samples into your workspace. The project name suggested for the samples is JasperReports Samples, the default one, to use the automated commands provided by this cheatsheet.

subitem.label: Select the project name for the samples, if possible leave the default one.
Hit "Finish" and wait the import is completed.

item.title: Compile the report
item.description: You can now compile the report by switching into the preview tab.
